channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：日本央行占据中心舞台，中国市场暴跌
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 扬科维奇并不担心中国队即将退出亚洲杯的未来
item.description: China coach Aleksandar Jankovic said his team were still alive in the Asian Cup after finishing third in Group A and he was not worried about losing his job after Monday's 1-0 loss to Qatar saw them finish the stage without scoring.翻译:中国队主教练扬科维奇表示，中国队在亚洲杯上以A组第三名的成绩仍然存在，周一0-1输给卡塔尔队，中国队在没有进球的情况下完成了赛段，他并不担心失去工作。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国“乏善可陈的复苏”对美国经济没有产生强烈影响——布雷纳德
item.description: China's lackluster economic recovery has not had a particularly strong effect on the U.S. economy given diversification of supply chains over the past years, White House National Economic Council Director Lael Brainard said on Monday.翻译:白宫国家经济委员会主任莱尔·布雷纳德周一表示，鉴于过去几年供应链的多元化，中国经济复苏乏力并未对美国经济产生特别强烈的影响。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 解释者：为什么加拿大要限制外国学生以及谁会受到影响？
item.description: Canada on Monday announced a two-year cap on the intake of foreign students after an explosive growth in recent years aggravated the housing shortage. Last year Canada issued nearly one million study permits, about three times that of a decade ago, according to government data and the new proposal will cut the intake by nearly a third.翻译:在近年来的爆炸式增长加剧了住房短缺之后，加拿大周一宣布对外国学生入学实行两年上限。根据政府数据，去年加拿大发放了近 100 万份学习许可，约为十年前的三倍，而新提案将减少近三分之一的录取人数。
item.author: Wa Lone

item.title: 塔吉克斯坦击败10人黎巴嫩队晋级亚洲杯16强
item.description: Asian Cup debutants Tajikistan qualified for the last 16 in dramatic fashion when they came from behind to snatch a last-gasp 2-1 victory over 10-man Lebanon in Group A after scoring their first ever goals in the tournament on Monday.翻译:首次亮相亚洲杯的塔吉克斯坦队在周一攻入亚洲杯首个进球后，在最后时刻以2-1战胜了A组10人小组的黎巴嫩队，以戏剧性的方式晋级16强。
item.author: Rohith Nair

item.title: JSW 集团将投资 50 亿美元在印度东部的电动汽车项目
item.description: JSW Group is set to invest 400 billion rupees ($4.81 billion) in electric vehicle (EV) manufacturing projects in India's coastal state of Odisha, as it takes on both domestic and international players in India's small but booming EV market.翻译:JSW 集团将在印度沿海奥里萨邦的电动汽车 (EV) 制造项目上投资 4000 亿卢比（48.1 亿美元），以在印度规模虽小但蓬勃发展的电动汽车市场上与国内和国际参与者展开竞争。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国科考船前往马尔代夫可能引起印度担忧
item.description: A Chinese research vessel is on its way to the Maldives, according to an Indian military official and an independent researcher, as new Maldivian President Mohamed Muizzu deepens ties with Beijing, distancing from New Delhi.翻译:据印度军方官员和独立研究人员称，随着马尔代夫新总统穆罕默德·穆伊祖加深与北京的关系，远离新德里，一艘中国科考船正在前往马尔代夫。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 需求忧郁主导锌市情绪
item.description: Until zinc demand picks up significantly and the market stops focusing on projected surpluses of the metal used to galvanise steel, price rallies triggered by production cuts are unlikely to be sustained.翻译:在锌需求大幅回升且市场不再关注用于镀锌的金属的预计过剩之前，减产引发的价格上涨不太可能持续。
item.author: Pratima Desai

item.title: 独家：中国游说各国在联合国审查前赞扬其人权记录——外交官
item.description: China has been lobbying non-Western countries to praise its human rights record ahead of a key U.N. meeting where it will face questions and criticism over its actions in Hong Kong and Xinjiang, according to diplomats and documents.翻译:据外交官和文件称，中国一直在游说非西方国家在联合国重要会议之前赞扬其人权记录，届时中国将因其在香港和新疆的行为而面临质疑和批评。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 郑爽超越多丁锁定墨尔本四分之一决赛席位
item.description: Zheng Qinwen cruised into the quarter-finals of the Australian Open with a commanding 6-0 6-3 victory over Frenchwoman Oceane Dodin on Monday to match her best performance in a Grand Slam.翻译:周一，郑沁文以6-0 6-3战胜法国选手奥阿娜·多丁，轻松晋级澳大利亚网球公开赛四分之一决赛，追平了她在大满贯中的最佳表现。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 早间出价：人工智能生成的牛市
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper翻译:阿曼达·库珀 (Amanda Cooper) 展望美国和全球市场未来一天
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 数据显示，在中国销量依然疲软的情况下，外国汽车品牌增加了出口
item.description: Foreign carmakers that have been losing market share to local rivals in China have boosted exports from the world's largest auto market, accounting for more than a fifth of the country's total vehicle exports last year, industry data showed.翻译:行业数据显示，市场份额一直被中国本土竞争对手夺走的外国汽车制造商却增加了中国这个全球最大汽车市场的出口，占中国去年汽车出口总额的五分之一以上。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 汇丰银行董事长对中国投资“充满信心”，会见副行长 - 官方媒体
item.description: China's Vice President Han Zheng on Monday met with HSBC Chairman Mark Tucker in Beijing and urged the banking giant to deepen cooperation with China to improve Hong Kong's status as a financial centre, the official Xinhua news agency reported.翻译:据官方新华社报道，中国国家副主席韩正周一在北京会见汇丰银行董事长马克·塔克，敦促这家银行业巨头深化与中国的合作，以提高香港的金融中心地位。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2023年中国住宅丧失抵押品赎回权将增加43%
item.description: The number of foreclosed homes in China rose 43% year-on-year in 2023, according to a private survey on Monday, highlighting a worrying trend of rising mortgage delinquencies amid a sustained property market slump and a patchy economic recovery.翻译:周一的一项私人调查显示，2023年中国止赎房屋数量同比增长43%，突显出在房地产市场持续低迷和经济复苏不平衡的情况下，抵押贷款拖欠率上升的令人担忧的趋势。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管经济放缓，北京仍提高了2024年的增长目标
item.description: China's capital city Beijing has set a growth target of around 5% for 2024, surpassing last year's target of above 4.5%, despite expectations of slower growth for the national economy.翻译:尽管国民经济增长预期放缓，但中国首都北京仍设定了2024年5%左右的增长目标，超过了去年4.5%以上的目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在漫画中警告其稀土面临“海外”威胁
item.description: China's chief intelligence agency posted on social media a comic strip featuring foreign-looking characters secretly extracting rare earths, in a story portraying the country's strategic metals under threat from covetous "overseas organisations".翻译:中国首席情报机构在社交媒体上发布了一幅连环漫画，其中有外国角色秘密开采稀土，故事描绘了中国的战略金属受到贪婪的“海外组织”的威胁。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 德国12月对美国和中国的出口大幅下降
item.description: Exports to Germany's most important overseas trade partners, including the United States and China, fell significantly at the end of last year, according to statistics office data on Monday.翻译:根据统计局周一的数据，去年年底，德国对美国和中国等最重要的海外贸易伙伴的出口大幅下降。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 碧桂园的离岸债券持有人选择柯克兰进行债务重组谈判 - 消息人士
item.description: A major group of Country Garden offshore creditors has appointed Kirkland & Ellis LLP as the legal adviser, a source familiar with the matter said, in a move towards discussing debt repayment options with the defaulted Chinese developer.翻译:一位知情人士称，碧桂园的一大海外债权人已任命凯易律师事务所为法律顾问，此举旨在与这家违约的中国开发商讨论债务偿还方案。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 伦敦股市上涨，房屋建筑商表现出色，中国疲软拖累矿商
item.description: UK stocks climbed on Monday after a record-setting rally on Wall Street helped outweigh concerns about a slowing British economy and sticky inflation, while homebuilders advanced with Persimmon leading the outperformance in the sector.翻译:英国股市周一攀升，华尔街创纪录的涨势帮助盖过了对英国经济放缓和通胀粘性的担忧，而房屋建筑商则上涨，其中 Persimmon 领涨该行业。
item.author: Sruthi Shankar, Shubham Batra

item.title: 全球股指上涨而美国国债收益率下跌
item.description: AI helped the tech sector ahead of a week of central-bank meetings, economic data and corporate earnings.翻译:在一周的央行会议、经济数据和企业盈利之前，人工智能为科技行业提供了帮助。
item.author: Sinéad Carew
